TopicTitle: Who Will Save You Now - Grand Tour Edition

Articles.Content:
This is a rewrite of the song "Who Will Save You Now" by Les Friction. It was inspired by the piece of writing "[AAR] A Grand Tour - A Voyage to the Planets" and is intended to be sung by Chief Engineer Nedfurt during his Mir 2 to Kerbin broadcast about the mission's secrets during the final part of the epilogue. This is a link to

.
